entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is the home of Harry's relatives, the Weasleys. It is mentioned as a place where they can quickly leave if needed.

entities.name: rucksack
entities.description: Hermione packed Harry's rucksack with essentials in case of an emergency.

entities.name: robes
entities.description: Ron handed Hermione his bundled-up robes to put into the bag.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: Harry wore his Invisibility Cloak to become invisible.

relationships.description: Hermione packed Harry's rucksack with essentials in case of an emergency.
Ron handed Hermione his bundled-up robes to put into the bag.
Hermione put Ron's robes into the bag.
Harry wore his Invisibility Cloak to become invisible.
